notes:
##  ........................................ Round 1 ........................................

---

### ⚡ Powers:

- The most influential powers early game are usually "actives". This is the case for Juno as we take  [Pulsar Plus](item_4795ae1f-580d-47ec-a01d-0933cba56212) .

- Why not take [Blink Boosts](item_9bac3119-781b-4dc0-94fa-9c293c02dc90) first round?
Because it's only good when paired with  [Mark of the Kitsune](item_09a53e39-25aa-4f66-ba51-bedbc543a1eb) and you'd only be able to buy it at round 2 at the earliest. You need to prioritize getting cash on these first 2 rounds and the power that gives you the most cash is  [Pulsar Plus](item_4795ae1f-580d-47ec-a01d-0933cba56212). It increases your damage AND healing output. No matter what you shoot, it will give you money to spend on the later rounds.

---
### 💣 Items:

- The most influential items on 1st round for low HP characters are Survival, though, not using 100% of our cash isnt beneficial so we'll only take 1. [First Aid Kit](item_0172eaaa-1902-44a3-b989-d12f0f7301da) being our best option for its passive.

- Then, to increase our Torpedo damage we buy [Power Playbook](item_6d8803cf-baa7-46ee-af91-51e7f2301418).
- And since we are spamming left click to heal our allies, we'll take  [Weapon Grease](item_961ae72f-434f-406b-a89b-ab8efec806bf) in an attempt to squeeze in a bit more healing numbers to earn more cash.

---

### 🎮 Playstyle:

- Keep left-clicking your tank. Its literally free cash. And tanks are the strongest characters on the lobby at Round 1.

- When you see an opening, try to jump high and to a side angle where enemies cant see you coming, and then torpedo twice. Your torpedos are best used when in pairs because you are not just trying to get healing or damage numbers, you want kills, and most importantly, assists!

##  ........................................ Round 2 ........................................

### 💣 Items:

- To get the most out of our money, we'll buy [Vantage Shot](item_6d7a0598-07cf-45ea-bbf5-c7e7b975e07a), which gives us 20% WP for only 4k (its the best ratio you can find for WP, at 200$ per every 1% WP).

- Then we'll take a key item to the build:  [Lock-On Shield](item_220287f8-1dc5-4a6c-9e86-c14cf970b689) . This item will be your best and only defensive item from Round 3 onwards.

- You can change [Vantage Shot](item_6d7a0598-07cf-45ea-bbf5-c7e7b975e07a) for either [Nano Cola](item_79b22609-8046-4a8a-a5a2-bb49cd7e11c6) or [Custom Stock](item_17d633af-8bcc-4893-b865-be0a7bc66fe2) to focus more on your torpedos instead. Although if you have good aim, i highly recommend you follow the recommended items since they will give you the most cash.

#### 💡 Tips:
- Thanks to  [Lock-On Shield](item_220287f8-1dc5-4a6c-9e86-c14cf970b689), right-clicks from now on will give you 88 Overhealth as long as you are aiming your torpedos. **Once you shoot, the Overhealth dissapears**, so if you are trying to escape, hold the torpedos!
- Try to stay on the air while you shoot enemies to fully take advantage of  [Vantage Shot](item_6d7a0598-07cf-45ea-bbf5-c7e7b975e07a)!

---

### 🎮 Playstyle:

- Your primary objective isn't winning, but to farm money. Now that you have [Lock-On Shield](item_220287f8-1dc5-4a6c-9e86-c14cf970b689) you should be more aggressive with your torpedos since you have more damage AND survivability with them.

- If you got [Vantage Shot](item_6d7a0598-07cf-45ea-bbf5-c7e7b975e07a) you'll swap from left-clicking your tank, to left-clicking the enemy tank (of course, without forgetting about healing your tank from time to time). And you'll do this while jumping and gliding to get the effect from  [Vantage Shot](item_6d7a0598-07cf-45ea-bbf5-c7e7b975e07a) going.

- If you got [Nano Cola](item_79b22609-8046-4a8a-a5a2-bb49cd7e11c6) you'll keep left-clicking your tank, and focus more on getting your torpedos to hit stuff.

---

### ⚙️ Optionals:

- If you are fat rich, i suggest you buy defensive items. The longer you stay alive the more cash you'll earn and the more cash you will deny enemies from having.  

- [Crusader Hydraulics](item_b64cee07-ca32-405d-987e-868b415bbc09) is insane on Juno since the 25 Armor it gives you will hide behind your ~150 shields giving you 10% damage reduction for more than half you life total! Especially good against  [Super Visor](item_b3db0ab0-26b4-4d99-893d-175f6726c9e9) [Soldier: 76](hero_e1ac7ef5-4648-4998-b8b0-9e3da3e60546), [Incendiary Rounds](item_0cff5b79-dd12-475a-aca1-24fd4e8b8491) [Ashe](hero_37b42a2d-a82d-4a22-9df2-4c812c873b54) and  [Full House](item_0001a9dc-79d5-48c9-92b0-85060efd897e) or  [Quick Draw](item_fce335e5-8093-4936-98c1-12ee26efd5d3) [Cassidy](hero_3dd63854-7558-4344-86e4-b506f807129b).

- Otherwise, you can take  [Reinforced Titanium](item_8ebaa7db-aedf-48ed-adc1-318cb46a3214), which should counter any Ability Power builds like  [Double Helix](item_808afc07-1398-4962-bf2c-f8e3b74014e3) [Soldier: 76](hero_e1ac7ef5-4648-4998-b8b0-9e3da3e60546) or [Pulsar Plus](item_4795ae1f-580d-47ec-a01d-0933cba56212) [Juno](hero_035c63b7-084c-4abd-9de5-c9a00e9b6a18) for example.

##  ........................................ Round 3 ........................................

### ⚡ Powers:  

- We take [Blink Boosts](item_9bac3119-781b-4dc0-94fa-9c293c02dc90) to pair with [Mark of the Kitsune](item_09a53e39-25aa-4f66-ba51-bedbc543a1eb) (explained below). This is non-negotiable.

---

### 💣 Items: 

*"Usually its better to fill your Item slots with rares since they have the best stats for the dollar ratio. But thanks to our powers we have 6 ability casts on short cooldowns that we can use to abuse [Mark of the Kitsune](item_09a53e39-25aa-4f66-ba51-bedbc543a1eb), and that just happens to be BROKEN!!!"*

- We take [Mark of the Kitsune](item_09a53e39-25aa-4f66-ba51-bedbc543a1eb) to pair with [Blink Boosts](item_9bac3119-781b-4dc0-94fa-9c293c02dc90). This is non-negotiable.

- Since we have so many ability casts, [Ironclad Exhaust Ports](item_2d085fa5-ace6-4fab-9323-b7a06268bcd0) becomes BROKEN on Juno! You literally become... [TITLE CARD].

- [Vantage Shot](item_6d7a0598-07cf-45ea-bbf5-c7e7b975e07a) is no longer needed as our healing and damage will be based off of AP ratios now. So we sell it to afford [Ironclad Exhaust Ports](item_2d085fa5-ace6-4fab-9323-b7a06268bcd0).

- If you have extra money, buy [First Aid Kit](item_0172eaaa-1902-44a3-b989-d12f0f7301da) and then [Armored Vest](item_358361e2-59be-4c81-b221-8a87f37809e6). 

- If you are fat rich get yourself a [Three-tap Tommygun](item_39c5d2a4-1db0-444f-86d9-2a1e9a331429). You can sell  [Lock-On Shield](item_220287f8-1dc5-4a6c-9e86-c14cf970b689) for it.

---

### 🎮 Playstyle:

- Your style of play from now on should be like an assassin, **you are a DPS** that just so happens to have some healing capabilities as well. You will spam your glides while dueling so they can give you 25 Overhealth each time and 32.5 extra damage on your next shot. Fly around like a wasp stinging everyone and anyone thats not the tank! Gain confidence, if you die you learn, but keep being aggressive since its **YOUR** responsability to carry the game, not your team's.

- From now on, every time you use an ability, the next time you *hit* an enemy with your primary fire it will deal (25*1.3) 32.5 extra damage! (if you miss, the *charge* isn't consumed, so don't worry)

- The charge doesn't expire with time, so you can stack one charge of [Mark of the Kitsune](item_09a53e39-25aa-4f66-ba51-bedbc543a1eb) while out of combat.

- You can now kill enemies with this combo: (Shoot ➡️ Glide ➡️  Shoot ➡️ Torpedo ➡️ Shoot). *If they are being healed, you'll of course need to either use more Glides or more Torpedos.*


---

### ⚙️ Optionals: 

- There's a REALLY fun item you can take called [Boosted Rockets](item_c3e0738f-cce2-431a-ad52-39176df84923). It will make your Glide Boosts INFINITE! Yes, i said INFINITE. This item dooooooes stall time from which you could activate another glide boost, basically reducing your Damage Per Second for  [Mark of the Kitsune](item_09a53e39-25aa-4f66-ba51-bedbc543a1eb) triggers, but it allows you to stay in the air indefinetly, so i guess its based on playstyle? Im not gonna suggest it in this build, but you should know about the interaction at least.

##  ........................................ Round 4 ........................................

### 💣 Items: 

- Just like last round, we will now buy [Three-tap Tommygun](item_39c5d2a4-1db0-444f-86d9-2a1e9a331429), which works the same way as [Mark of the Kitsune](item_09a53e39-25aa-4f66-ba51-bedbc543a1eb) does. Dealing ~27 extra damage against 300 HP enemies after every ability. This is thanks to our primary weapon being a burst of many little bullets, triggering the %hp damage 3 times in a single left-click!

- Extra cash can and should go towards our survivability. As explained in "Round 2 / Optionals" you can either take [Crusader Hydraulics](item_b64cee07-ca32-405d-987e-868b415bbc09) or [Reinforced Titanium](item_8ebaa7db-aedf-48ed-adc1-318cb46a3214).

- If you lack cash to buy [Three-tap Tommygun](item_39c5d2a4-1db0-444f-86d9-2a1e9a331429) you can sell [Lock-On Shield](item_220287f8-1dc5-4a6c-9e86-c14cf970b689) for it.

---

### 🎮 Playstyle:

- Same as previous round. But harder emphasis on hitting at *least* 3 shots of your gun in-between abilities.

- This charge doesn't expire with time, so you can also stack one charge of [Three-tap Tommygun](item_39c5d2a4-1db0-444f-86d9-2a1e9a331429) while out of combat.

---

### ⚙️ Optionals:

- There's an argument for [Cybervenom](item_210a8582-91ec-4cf3-968a-a443f3a0c505) here at Round 4. If you analyze that your biggest obstacle to win the round is an insane ammount of heals comming from the enemy team, A.K.A. when you are against two main healers such as [Mercy](hero_0e213bfc-3ca9-49c6-9036-e7f344b752da) + [Moira](hero_7fb6ff1e-a193-40c0-bd0a-25c1928fbaed) for example, then this isnt such a bad idea to take now. This doesnt mean every time they run 2 main healers you go  [Cybervenom](item_210a8582-91ec-4cf3-968a-a443f3a0c505), its just an option you have that you'll do maybe 5~10% of the time and only when you have a competent team and are not against a [D.Va](hero_e8e1dc68-45c4-47c2-b421-95e33594e6b6).

##  ........................................ Round 5 ........................................

### ⚡ Powers:  

*"Previously i used to suggest we take [Stinger](item_e9d0d530-d620-4e74-a34d-38cdebfeb9a4) paired with [Cybervenom](item_210a8582-91ec-4cf3-968a-a443f3a0c505). You guys made me realize they don't actually work together. And even tho [Cybervenom](item_210a8582-91ec-4cf3-968a-a443f3a0c505) is still very powerful with your torpedos, after experimenting with variations for a week or so i found the following to be the best round 5 combination."*

- If you can aim: [Medimaster](item_a04e1041-01c1-46ed-801e-d0590003e9b6).

- If you can't aim:  [Stinger](item_e9d0d530-d620-4e74-a34d-38cdebfeb9a4).

- If you are being hard countered:  [Hyper Healer](item_108336b3-54d2-4d69-8ea4-c2da5affb7ca).

---

### 💣 Items: 

- If you chose [Medimaster](item_a04e1041-01c1-46ed-801e-d0590003e9b6) you should take either [Gravitational Push](item_2df314f2-c983-4984-bb08-070f93add5e1) or [El-sa'ka Supressor](item_b4298dd9-9b93-461f-a2e0-843402667100) (if their healers are too strong).

- If you chose [Stinger](item_e9d0d530-d620-4e74-a34d-38cdebfeb9a4) or [Hyper Healer](item_108336b3-54d2-4d69-8ea4-c2da5affb7ca) then you want either [Phantasmic Flux](item_5e644a79-cf6e-4196-8d0a-232f75004643) or [Cybervenom](item_210a8582-91ec-4cf3-968a-a443f3a0c505) (if their healers are too strong).

-  [Phantasmic Flux](item_5e644a79-cf6e-4196-8d0a-232f75004643) is your best defensive item you could take this round no matter which Power you chose. It goes super well with the overhealth items we had previously purchased, since they will protect your max REAL health while your lifesteal farms extra HP from [Phantasmic Flux](item_5e644a79-cf6e-4196-8d0a-232f75004643)'s overhealth effect.

---

### 🎮 Playstyle:

- If you got [Medimaster](item_a04e1041-01c1-46ed-801e-d0590003e9b6) you'll have to focus on getting on top of your enemies more often, and hitting those headshots.

- If you got [Stinger](item_e9d0d530-d620-4e74-a34d-38cdebfeb9a4), apart from being able to poke some chip damage from afar, you play as previously.

- If you got [Cybervenom](item_210a8582-91ec-4cf3-968a-a443f3a0c505) try to use your torpedos on as many enemies as possible instead of 1 or 2. 30% reduced healing on the whole enemy team wins you the teamfights more often than not.

- If you got [Phantasmic Flux](item_5e644a79-cf6e-4196-8d0a-232f75004643) try to surprise hit people, as it will give you extra Overhealth before they start shooting back at you!

---

### ⚙️ Optionals:

- If you are losing because your team lacks healing (maybe your other support just sucks at the game), then you can take [Medicinal Missiles](item_30eeab6c-4a1e-4a16-b9dd-e83d633caa40) to compensate, but it will force you to play more passively, which is not what we are trying to do at all haha.

- You can take [Champion's Kit](item_8682f8c7-8811-439b-8d50-fa81cd43ddce) if you got [Stinger](item_e9d0d530-d620-4e74-a34d-38cdebfeb9a4) and extra cash.

- (If you dont have much cash you can buy [Custom Stock](item_17d633af-8bcc-4893-b865-be0a7bc66fe2) and either [Crusader Hydraulics](item_b64cee07-ca32-405d-987e-868b415bbc09) or [Reinforced Titanium](item_8ebaa7db-aedf-48ed-adc1-318cb46a3214) instead of an epic).

- (If you have enough cash to buy [Phantasmic Flux](item_5e644a79-cf6e-4196-8d0a-232f75004643) by replacing [Power Playbook](item_6d8803cf-baa7-46ee-af91-51e7f2301418), then do it).

---

####  ..................................................*"This is the peak of the build."*...................................................

##  ........................................ Round 6 ........................................

*"By Round 6 there's a lot of Optionals you could've taken, so to simplify i'll assume you took no Optionals and instead, followed the main path of the build."*

---

### 💣 Items: 

- [Phantasmic Flux](item_5e644a79-cf6e-4196-8d0a-232f75004643) is the best item you can take rn. It gives you all you need: WP%, AP%, Lifesteal and extra health!

- If somehow you have enough money to buy [Champion's Kit](item_8682f8c7-8811-439b-8d50-fa81cd43ddce) then do that instead or if you can sell [Lock-On Shield](item_220287f8-1dc5-4a6c-9e86-c14cf970b689) for it and keep  [Phantasmic Flux](item_5e644a79-cf6e-4196-8d0a-232f75004643) do that.

---

### 🎮 Playstyle:

- Now with [Phantasmic Flux](item_5e644a79-cf6e-4196-8d0a-232f75004643) you are entinced to poke a bit before entering duels

---

### ⚙️ Optionals:

-  [El-sa'ka Supressor](item_b4298dd9-9b93-461f-a2e0-843402667100) or [Cybervenom](item_210a8582-91ec-4cf3-968a-a443f3a0c505) instead of  [Phantasmic Flux](item_5e644a79-cf6e-4196-8d0a-232f75004643) for reasons already discussed in Round 5.

##  ........................................ Round 7 ........................................

### ⚡ Powers:  

- If you havent wont by this point, its cause you lack survivability, so we'll take  [Hyper Healer](item_108336b3-54d2-4d69-8ea4-c2da5affb7ca) . Hyper Ring now gives you and your team 100 Overhealth, and every time you use an ability you will start regenerating shields.

---

### 💣 Items: 

*"This round is a complete mess most of the time, you should keep  [Mark of the Kitsune](item_09a53e39-25aa-4f66-ba51-bedbc543a1eb),  [Three-tap Tommygun](item_39c5d2a4-1db0-444f-86d9-2a1e9a331429) and [Gravitational Push](item_2df314f2-c983-4984-bb08-070f93add5e1), but after that you have 3 spaces left that could literally be anything! I'll drop a list of useful items i recommend in order from best to worst. But it's up to you to decide which other 3 you want to take."*

-  [Champion's Kit](item_8682f8c7-8811-439b-8d50-fa81cd43ddce).

-  [El-sa'ka Supressor](item_b4298dd9-9b93-461f-a2e0-843402667100) or  [Cybervenom](item_210a8582-91ec-4cf3-968a-a443f3a0c505).

-  [Solar Shielding](item_804fd8cd-78bd-46ee-a89f-20a6c9cccdcc).

-  [Superflexor](item_580b77b4-0d63-469b-99a8-5372c55dfc1b).

-  [Fort-Glide](item_84d8b6cc-5421-4848-bf9b-09a0ce85f09f).

*"We sell  [Phantasmic Flux](item_5e644a79-cf6e-4196-8d0a-232f75004643) since we dont have  [Lock-On Shield](item_220287f8-1dc5-4a6c-9e86-c14cf970b689) or ' [Ironclad Exhaust Ports](item_2d085fa5-ace6-4fab-9323-b7a06268bcd0) to go with it anymore."*

---

Hope the build helped! Its been a ton of fun to grind her on Stadium! (^u^) Peace!♥️
